description: A circular mounting bracket with a 120mm outer diameter, 80mm inner diameter, 10mm thickness, and four equally spaced 6mm mounting holes on a 100mm bolt circle diameter.
code:
import cadquery as cq

result = (
    cq.Workplane("XY")
    .circle(60)  # Outer radius
    .circle(40)  # Inner radius (hole)
    .extrude(10)  # Thickness
    .faces(">Z")
    .workplane()
    .polarArray(100/2, 0, 360, 4)  # Bolt circle radius and 4 holes
    .hole(6)
)
prompt: A circular mounting bracket with a 120mm outer diameter, 80mm inner diameter, 10mm thickness, and four equally spaced 6mm mounting holes on a 100mm bolt circle diameter.
